website_summaries.verdict: Featuring 40 different shades of eye glitter, this large set offers exceptional value for money.
pros: The set stands out for its wide range of hues, from subtle browns and golds to vibrant reds and pinks
Comes with two brushes for more precise application
cons: While it works out extremely affordable per piece, the large size of this set means it's fairly pricey

customer_reviews.title: No brushes!
customer_reviews.text: I've only swatched a hand full of the shades so far...but with a white eyeshadow primer they seem to have a nice color pay off. I'm only giving 3 stars because mine didn't come with the 2 free brushes! The box was in perfect condition...it's was sealed shut with what looked to be the original seal, however the slots for the brushes sat empty. How frustrating! I'm not sure how great the quality of the brushes would have been...but #1 as a MUA I could ALWAYS use more brushes and #2 if it says it comes with it then....hello, I expect it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeshadow, variety of colors
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that these colors do change every year. If you order two you will get the same exact colors in each one, but each year they come out with a new one. I wish they had a black or two in it but for the price and amount of color you get it can't be beat. There are some duplicates which I was a little irritated with. The quality of the shadows are fantastic. Mix them with a bit of water for more pigment. The set I got was ALL glitter. NO matte colors at all. I am really hoping Shany comes out with a set that is matte. I would order that in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: This set is beautiful!! So many wonderful colors and all the canisters are full. Came in a nice box with 2 nice application brushes. I will be recommending this to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Highly pigment eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: Dont hesitate to buy this product is everything well worth the money can in time and i cant wait to create different looks with this highly pigment eyeshadow
customer_reviews.author: Dalenea  adams

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: these are beautiful and pigmented. A wet brush applied the product perfectly I didn't even need glitter glue! These are more eyeshadow than chunky glitter. Beautiful for a dramatic eye for a night out. Love
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pigments
customer_reviews.text: I love that some are the shadows are glittery more than others. All of them have an amazing pigment.
customer_reviews.author: Brie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect set! As a cosmetology student I need some affordable products with good quailty and I found them. My friends are wanting to order too!
customer_reviews.author: jb4l1f3

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: ive had these for awhile but recently started playing around with them...theyre awesome for creating looks with just about every color but if youre looking for super intense color they probably wont live up to expectations. aside from that, i would definitely buy them again because for the amount of money spent it is worth every penny because they have lasted and they give you a lot in every container.
customer_reviews.author: jen thomas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Not all glittery. No fall out from the package. Quite happy with my order!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure if I was going to like this as it is hard to tell from a picture if the colors are something you might like but much to my surprise I love this set and would say that if you want to have alot of different colors then you will like this set. It comes in a nice box and the brushes it comes with are nice. I am happy I bought this and would say give it a try.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with product
customer_reviews.text: Smooth transaction with fast shipment. Very pleased with product, thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: V-Fan

customer_reviews.title: Decent deal but wish I did not receive duplicates
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this is an excellent deal for mineral makeup. That being said, I am a little disappointed in the colors received since I seemed to get more yellow and orange shades than expected. I received no greys or blacks, and only one purple. I am happy with the neutral colors, pinks, blues, and two green I received though. I still gave four stars because you can't beat the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Donna A.

customer_reviews.title: Great color variety
customer_reviews.text: My teenage daughter and her friends loved this so much we are going to order another set. My daughter said she wishes it had more purple so hopefully the next set will have a few more purples. Love how it looks wet too!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Springer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love how bright and vibrant the colors are. So worth every penny that was spent. Really long lasting, made it through a shift as a bar cook
customer_reviews.author: Mike Champagne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this yesterday and have begun to dabble with it. Keep in mind this set comes with different types of eyeshadows. In the sense that some are fine sheen like colors while others are more glitter like and a little more corse. Perfect for accenting. Shipment was perfect, case is beautiful and displays the colors perfectly. Sealed so no spillage happens in shipping. Every color is beautiful and unique. I will continue to review once I have used this a bit more but so far I am very much pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty N

customer_reviews.title: Very powdery, soft & light, feels good on, not as glittery as  I thought which is great for me!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase. Packaging was great, product looked as described, beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.author: LoveofLife

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: its good because it is a lot of product, is very pretty ...however if u are expecting actual glitters... then don't buy it. it is shimmery eyeshaddows and is very good for professional makeup artists.... also a primer is needed for the shimmer to stick to the lids
customer_reviews.author: cherisse mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: I had to wet my brush to apply
customer_reviews.text: If I don't wet my brush to apply then it seems more glitter than any color. It is hard to blend but once the final art design is done it still looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Marie

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a whim and I love them only down fall is that the sifter for the powder to come out is to large of holes and so you get alot of powder instead of just a bit making you super shiney.
customer_reviews.author: LucyDOTD

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are extremely bright and work really well! They are so sparkly and pretty, and there isn't a color you cant have by combining them
customer_reviews.author: Shelbielb

customer_reviews.title: She was happy and said it was good quality
customer_reviews.text: Another gift for the teenager. She was happy and said it was good quality. For a NARS user I think that is a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessika MacKinnon

customer_reviews.title: Packaging  was great
customer_reviews.text: Like some colors do not stay unless they have glue but in love with everything
customer_reviews.author: AnJell

customer_reviews.title: WOW!! Just wow!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors exactly as I expected. With a primer it goes on really smoothly and the glitter shows up very nicely. This product goes above and beyond on quality and smoothness and usability and packaging everything, especially when you consider buying these colors individually in the grocery store or cosmetic store would cost so much more!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B

customer_reviews.title: awesome shadows
customer_reviews.text: some of the colors i was unsure about, but after wearing them and getting lots of complements i now use them all on a daily basis. Great colors and highly pigmented
customer_reviews.author: Terry A

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nt as pigmented as expectbut still good if you use primer
customer_reviews.author: R BAYLEY

customer_reviews.title: I love this product it stays on well and looks great
customer_reviews.text: A few years ago i gave up on eye shadow completely no matter what i did it always stuck in the creases I was given this product as a gift and now I cant get enough ... I love this product it stays on well and looks great ... A few of the colors are similar but if you know your colors you can tell the different undertones ... Its great for any outfit you can imagine :)
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is an excellent product, I used it for my dance presentations and it was the best idea.
customer_reviews.author: Maria.

customer_reviews.title: OMG AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I debated on ordering these... the size?? the color?? would I like them?? Well let me tell you the size is about 1oz. each and the colors AWESOME not super brilliant just right... and I LOVE THEM!!!! I only wish they sold singles now to replace the ones I am going to use up :) maybe by the time they run out they will be selling them individually. :) I must say i looked at these for the longest time and just could not justify the money but i am glad I finally ordered them .... YOU WILL NOT REGRET IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: d elliott

customer_reviews.title: Great range of colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price. A large range of glittery colors and comes with two brushes. These are a fine and not chunky glitter and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: Pleased :)
customer_reviews.text: I loved this purchase some of the colors are bright and then you have those you can wear any time. Great set!!
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: What a BARGAIN!!!
customer_reviews.text: This set is worth hundreds if bought individually. The jars are double the size of the average jar. The pigments can be used to mix with nail polish, lip gloss, white/clear base mascara color, body shimmer as well as wet or dry. The metallics are very intense.
customer_reviews.author: Selina-Marie Serrano

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so excited to have shimmery and glittery eyeshadow in nearly every color in the rainbow and MORE!!! This is a GREAT DEAL. I'm won't need to buy eyeshadow for years!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lake

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Was not as pictured. Did not receive any reds and only one purple. I can work with what I got, but definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: So many colors!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are beautiful!! Very vibrant and great for going out. The brushes are very nice and soft as well. The capsules are a great size and this whole set should last anyone for a LONG time. Well worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Coburn

customer_reviews.title: Awsome eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: I love the pigment of this eye shadow and it goes on so smoothly. I will buy this again when I run out. Love this companies product.
customer_reviews.author: Meggan G. Naef

customer_reviews.title: So far so good but it seems like Some colors are the same ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good but it seems like Some colors are the same and they have a strong perfume smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors
customer_reviews.text: The colors arent as vibrant as I wouldve wanted, but they still show up very well. And don't get confused like me every single color contains glitter. I thought just a few of them would but they all do. It would be great it some of the shadows didnt contain the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Davis

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: Very shimmery... I love the colors!!! Plus its a good price for just 40 loose eyeshadows. I recommend this for you ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product after seeing all the great reviews and overall the product was ok i received this product very quick which I always do with all my shany products I was kind of disappointed when I started to look at the colors because I didn't feel like they reflect the colors in the pictures or even the box some of the colors looked the same to me I noticed from reading a lot of other peoples reviews this was a problem for them as well but on a positive for less than 50 u get all these great eyeshadows so I would recommend buying this just don't expect all the great colors you see in the pictures
customer_reviews.author: Nuny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my makeup! Excellent quality and the shipping was super fast!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hutsler

customer_reviews.title: Shany loose pearl eyeshadow Glitter
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors more vibrant and great colors than it shows in photo, really like the packaging and plus the two brushes ! I recommend it for home or professional use .
customer_reviews.author: tamar

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: this was wayyyy above what I expected! absolutely loved it and it had every single color in it! I was just absolutely satisfied with it
customer_reviews.author: Deisy

customer_reviews.title: Forget CoverGirl!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant to try a new brand, but WOW the eye liner, powder and shadow are all amazing. They stay on and are such vibrant/sharp colors. SHANY is my new make up line!
customer_reviews.author: Britt Do

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT !
customer_reviews.text: JUST GOT MINE YESTERDAY IN THE MAIL, I LOVE ITTTTT GREAT QUALITY, GREAT COLORS, I LOVE IT <3 GREAT BUY !!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great, lots of pretty colors to enjoy! I'm having lots of fun with them...The brushes work very well too.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Whiteside

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love it I will buy it again.I would suggest this to anyone.I'm going to buy another one and use it on my clients.
customer_reviews.author: debra braccio

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Assortment
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love, the mineral wear, there are so many assortments in the package and I love all of the different colors it binds well with my primer.
customer_reviews.author: Cococay

customer_reviews.title: the pigments are not easily transfered on to your skin
customer_reviews.text: the pigments are not easily transfered on to your skin , comes off to easily, feels gritty, i even tried applying with severaly diffrent brushes i even tried applying with a damp brush, this product just is a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: luvinglam
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this set. It arrived in perfect condition. The colors are fantastic. I couldn't be happier. Plus-- I saved a ton buying on AMAZON! You wont be sorry. The product is easy to use. If you have any trouble consult YOUTUBE as they have tons of videos on this particular set. It's fabulous! No regrets on this one other than I waited to long to buy :)
customer_reviews.author: luvinglam

customer_reviews.title: More than worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The pigments are bright and last all day/night especially when used on primed lids. Loving the different combinations I have created so far. I get so many compliments on my makeup. Will definitely buy more products from Shany!
customer_reviews.author: Christy McMichael

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Inglot quality, I'm very impressed I just wish they were all glitter pigments, only 5 were, the rest look like bare minerals loose shadows, great deal though, for a fraction of the price🤑
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and a great product! I use these everyday and get tons of complements. Came in nice packaging and all were individually sealed, so no product was lost.
customer_reviews.author: lacey molina

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful.... worth it... i love the shine and sparkle make .net reality happy... great die everyone who loves makeup
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Roberson

customer_reviews.title: To much RED
customer_reviews.text: I love the price, Color pay off. I am Blue girl though. I love my royals and midnight's but out of this kit all i received is one light blue and a teal. I have 6 reds though... not as many browns either. Plus no neutrals. So if your into reds and oranges, plus yellows go for it! If not don't. now keep in mind THE COLORS VARY PER ORDER. The color pay off is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Was not happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift to my sister and she hated it and laughed when she got it. Quality was poor but the brushes are good
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! I am delighted with my purchase. I love the color selection and was happy with the quality. I feel that for the price, you get a lot of product and can create so many make-up looks. The colors are all shimmery, so if you're looking for matte colors, this isn't the product for you. If you like shimmers and glitters, this will be a perfect match. The pigments come an a black tray and the containers can easily be stored in the sturdy product box. I would recommend this product to others and I'm planning on purchasing more products from Shany. I feel like this company, which is PETA approved needs more recognition.
customer_reviews.author: ImareaderTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this product and uses it often. The quality is beyond what she expected and the colors are amazing. It will last all day depending on what you are doing and has a huge supply of eyeshadow. Just keep them at room temperature and they should be fine. This is an awesome product I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular!
customer_reviews.text: gorgeous colors, plus such an ENORMOUS variety! Lovely soft brushes too! Lovely sturdy packaging makes everything clear and not confusing. Surpasses my wildest expectations! Every color has a lovely really attractive iridescence too! Christmas in July! Spectacular!
customer_reviews.author: F. Bernstein

customer_reviews.title: You can also get really creative and do some fun face makeup with these as the glitter is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mix with liquid lipsticks-anyone an OCC Lip Tar fan, I'm obsessed-and they work perfectly for that. You can also get really creative and do some fun face makeup with these as the glitter is very fine and won't damage your eyes if it falls in. Very important, if you're doing eye makeup to purchase glitter that won't damage your eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Love 👍
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my makeup kit and it has been a great investment. It comes with lots of beautiful colors and each container comes with a lot of product. These pigments are very bright and I would compare them to the MAC pigments but less expensive. I love using them wet for a metallic finish or on top of glitter glue for a more glittery look. There are endless possibilities to these. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beautyaddictxo

customer_reviews.title: OMG These are the best, you will be complimented on these colors
customer_reviews.text: OMG These are the best, you will be complimented on these colors. Use them with glitter adhesive, it will look amazing!! you can get creative with these. great for Arabic applications,, or cut crease looks.. the best ever, affordable, a must buy. Great for makeup kits, I'm an esthetician with highly sensitive skin, and recommend this!!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received my loose pearl eye shadow set. The colors are vibrant with a wide variety of colors. Couldn't have chosen a better set.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great, deep rich pigments. Great for those who can't afford MAC.
customer_reviews.text: Great pigments! Nice, deep rich colors as long as water is applied, but it doesn't need much. The sheer ones though need a lot of layering to get to work. I stay away from the sparkle one's because I have yet to successfully place them, but the price is still worth all the other ones that work.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Laudicina

customer_reviews.title: So pigmented! I did my whole eye looks with ...
customer_reviews.text: So pigmented! I did my whole eye looks with these the other day and was so impressed. They lasted all day.
customer_reviews.author: Haley A

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: I waited for a while because it was out of stock and I think first order lost some where. But thank you so much AMAZON you are amazing like your name they send me new package one day delivery and I'm so happy. Going to attend a wedding and will show everyone. The colors are incredible for me, I'm in love with this. I think I don't need to order for a while or look for any eyeshadow so bye bye Sephora and thank you Shany.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalina

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on pigments!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pigments! They are all shiny no Mattes. You get a lot of product for the price. Also the 2 brushes are perfect for pressing the pigments on your lids.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Wanamaker

customer_reviews.title: They're awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! They arrived as per the scheduled delivery date, and came excellently packaged. Some of the vials look like the repeat but they don't; the repetitive looking ones have a glittery addition to them. The Eye shadow themselves maintain the Shany Cosmetics quality, and are just perfect.They are well made, and apply well. I would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: scrubsnayush

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeshadows, amazing pigment
customer_reviews.text: Great eyeshadows, amazing pigment. Mix with a littlr coconut oil and its like a gel eyeshadow. I love my shany, now to get the gel eyeliners
customer_reviews.author: Kayla A

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this set of eye shadows! They are vibrant and shimmery and I did not see any duplicate shades, which I was worried about based on another buyer's comments. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews stated they got several shades of whites, and no bright colors, but my set game with vibrant oranges, blues,reds, yellows, and greens, along with browns, pinks, purples, ect. great deal, especially for the price. plus the containers are pretty big for loose powder, and filled to the top.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: A bad investment
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in these eye shadows. The consistency and coloring of each shadow is different for every container. For a lot of the eyeshadows it seems like the color and glitter look disappears almost completely even if you're using a lot. Also when using a lot, the glitter tends to run down your face as the day progresses, so you look like you're crying glitter. On a separate note, the bright orange shadow made me look like an alien. Conclusion: Pretty expensive product for what it turned out to be, I would have been better off buying individual eye shadows with glitter already in it...that way I would have only the colors I want.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: OMG These pigments are AMAZING definitely worth super worth their prize, long lasting, super pigmented, and a lot comes in the bottle. I loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Marelin

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: For what your getting for the price, it can't be beat. I just have share time getting the powder out of the container. I have to bang a few times. However, it is nice to have a selection to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: great color pay off
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pearlized loose pigment. Very pigmented color. I used dry and found color to be amazing. The brushes it comes with are perfect for application. I would recommend this product. Works great with too faced shadow insurance glitter glue.
customer_reviews.author: Puggle Mom

customer_reviews.title: But Im pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews before I purchased and they were correct that there are the same color multiple times, with only a hint of difference. But Im pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya1970

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Colors...great selection!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with this purchase! There is a great variety, here and the colors are bright. I have used them with and without primer and both ways, the colors show up well and stay on all day! I will definitely be getting more products from Shany Cosmetics!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Willis

customer_reviews.title: bright and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these shadows!I have some micabella mineral shadows also but the colors of these are great looking.some people commented that they had a problem with the wear of the shadows but I have not. Wish they would come out with an time set.
customer_reviews.author: newbee

customer_reviews.title: Love myself some Colors!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would've bought it today! I see its cheaper but I still got a great deal thank God! lol its worth it too. This is my Christmas present to my self. I always wanted this and now I got it. Nice size for each Color individually. Great colors too.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying Shany cosmetics and I really time it, really nice colors and very pigmented. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Selma

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: 2-3 colors families look exactly a like throughout this set
customer_reviews.author: Ja China Doll

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shades very vibrant and sparkling they also last all day and then some I love playing with the many different colors!! So worth the money spent
customer_reviews.author: icepink

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this product. Came quickly and exactly like it stated it would come. Great quality product for sure!
customer_reviews.author: LaQueena

customer_reviews.title: NICE
customer_reviews.text: FAST DELIVERY, GREAT COLORS TO CHOOSE FROM AND TWO NICE BRUSHES THAT I WAS NOT EXPECTING. WOULD RECOMEND THIS PRODUCT ALTHOUGH I WOULD HAVE LIKED MORE BROWN NATURAL COLORS.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Garcia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: LOve Love LOve!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shadows, great variety. Some of them may look like they are the same colors but they are not, they are all different and they are a good size with alot of powder! Will be ordering again. I use a base on my eyelids to really make the color pop but they can be used without a primer
customer_reviews.author: Christina Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Reccomend!
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this product. Best make up purchase from Amazon yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mineral based loose eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and has many bright colors to choose from. I have had a lot of women ask what kind of eye shadow I was wearing and even to do a make over on them. I am not a make up artist just someone who loves make up.
customer_reviews.author: Zip

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I just received my eyeshadow set! Let me start of by saying that it is perfectly packaged in a neat black box, when I opened it all the shadows were neat and in place. When I opened one of the shadows up and tryed it the color was beautiful ans vibrant and very shimmery !!!! If you want lots of sparkle I would define till recommend getting this kit. I'm taking it to vegas so I can look sparkly every day!
customer_reviews.author: Vira

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Some people wrote that they have no ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Some people wrote that they have no color, but that is because they do not know how to use them. Like most of pigments, they work better if you spray water on your brush before using them. I took pictures so u can see how great the color can be with just some water. Even post same pic with or without flash. Great price, my box had lots of colors, very much like the picture in Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Karla Castro

customer_reviews.title: NICE!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT COLORS!!! VERY PIGMENTED, GO ON WITH EASE, BUT I WOULD RECOMMEND BUYING A BASE SO IT WILL MAKE IT EASIER TO APPLY. BUT I LOVE THIS PIGMENT!!
customer_reviews.author: Samara Brown

customer_reviews.title: amaizing
customer_reviews.text: is wonderful, the colors are so nice, incredible is my shadow prefer
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Salazar

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness guys. I love this eye shadow! Colors are awesome! Makes a great highlighter! and Lip glitter if you have moisturizing lipstick it wont feel dry at all! Its freaking beautiful and makes me feel like a magical fantasy human being. I bought this specifically for a change of style. I like colors. I like things to pop and these do just that! With just the eyeshadow some eyeliner and mascare I didnt even need much else! It is amazing! It is kind of messy thougj so definitely be careful!
customer_reviews.author: OokamiSouls

customer_reviews.title: Repeated color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this with the intentions that I was getting 40 different colors, im looking through these and i have 5 colors that have been repeated twice I have two number 02, 24, 05, 12 and 38 I'm annoyed!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dannine Winfield

customer_reviews.title: Pigments so rich!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Were do I start. Divas it a must! Pigments are extremely High Quality and LONG lasting. You can use for regular use but if you do photoshoots THIS IS A MUST! The color are Rich! The glitter are great to. But im more of a fan of the rich Pigments.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess thoughts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They are ok for foiling eyeshadow but not usable alone. Most of the colors repeated 3 times. It was great for my clients that wanted a heavy shimmer as I could only foil it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but not all colors are sent to you.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal! You don't get all of the colors shown in the photo, but I'm absolutely in love with the product it self.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

product_meta.title: SHANY Cosmetics Mineral base Loose Pearl Eye Shadow Glitter/Eye Shadow 40pc Set with 2 Free Eye Shadow Brush and reusable case
product_meta.description: 40 different color pigment with an amazing technique that combines the anti-aging and antioxidant benefits of minerals with a gorgeous pure tones in shades of blue, gold, silver, pastel and earth tones this mineral pigment were designed to be a multiuse product for face and body, a surreal and vibrant look. Shimmering, sparkling, and trendy, each pot comes packed with shimmering loose eye shadow with intense sparkles as well as a long wearing formula. The jars conveniently tuck in small clutches, cosmetic organizers, and make-up bags and the case includes 40 loose eye shadow pots and 2 free brushes.
feature_bullets: Set of 40 containers of loose eyeshadow powders.
Kit includes a variety of highly enriched and saturated colors.
Texture is finely milled and glides on smoothly to provide a satin look and feel.
Includes set of two premium makeup brushes for easy application.
Makes a great gift for both makeup professionals and cosmetic novices.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
